Package bigshot

Contains classes for image transformation, as well as image pyramid and VR cube generation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCubicTransform<Derived extends AbstractCubicTransform>
    Transforms an image map to a set of rectilinear images.
    AbstractCubicTransform.TransformedFace
    A delayed-evaluated Image.
    AbstractSphericalCubicTransform<Derived extends AbstractCubicTransform>
    Base class for transforms where the transformation to image map space can be expressed in terms of the two angles theta and phi of the sight ray.
    CylindricalToCubic
    Transforms an cylindrical image map to rectilinear images.
    EquirectangularToCubic
    Transforms an equirectangular image map to rectilinear images.
    FastTrigInverse
    Fast inverse trigonometric functions based on lookup tables and linear interpolation between lookup table values.
    FastTrigInverse.FastAcos
    Fast inverse-cosine.
    FastTrigInverse.FastAtan
    Fast inverse-cosine.
    Image
    A 30-bit (10 per channel) RGB image.
    ImageInsert
    An image that is projected into an existing panorama.
    ImagePyramidParameters
    A typesafe interface to the parameters for MakeImagePyramid.
    MakeImagePyramid
    Command-line tool to creates the tiled image pyramids that are used by Bigshot.
    MathUtil
    Math utility functions.
    Point2D
    A mutable 2D point
    Point3D
    A 3D point
    Point3DTransform
    A 3x3 matrix transform.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ImagePyramidParameters.DescriptorFormat
    The descriptor format for the output pyramid.
    ImagePyramidParameters.FolderLayout
    The folder structure of the output pyramid.
    ImagePyramidParameters.Format
    The output format for the image pyramid.
    ImagePyramidParameters.ImageFormat
    Image format for the tiles and everything.
    ImagePyramidParameters.LevelNumbering
    If set to "invert", inverts the level numbering.
    ImagePyramidParameters.Preset
    A preset set of parameters.
    ImagePyramidParameters.Transform
    The input image transform

Package bigshot Description

Contains classes for image transformation, as well as image pyramid and VR cube generation.
See Also:
MakeImagePyramid, EquirectangularToCubic, CylindricalToCubic
